title: ragilab color lottery
text1: Pick your favorite color and win the jackpot on the first lottery on substrate.
text2: Use the frontend and the contract (written in ink!) as base for your own project - and get rich quick
label: Buy a ticket

title: Rules
text1: A ticket is a bet on a specific colour in HEX format. The price of a ticket is 1 microunit. The ticket is always valid for the current round and each colour is sold a maximum of eight times per round. A round consists of several draws. The round ends when the jackpot is won. The jackpot consists of 100% of the revenue from the tickets sold in a round.

title: Source
text1: As a developer, I prioritize the concept of open source. That's why the entire code for this lottery is freely accessible and can be viewed, modified, and distributed by anyone.
